heading.part2: Here you can quickly and easily set up a competition, make schedules and draws, and report results
heading.loggedInHelper: Select a competition to administer. Or create a new one.
heading.competitionChoice: Select an existing competition to administer
heading.newCompetition: Or set up a new competition

bottom.section1: CompetitionPlanner focuses on several different steps in the competition organization process. It is possible to:
bottom.bullit1: Create new competitions with categories, draws and schedules
bottom.bullit2: Administer a competition while it is ongoing, report results and manage times and tables
bottom.bullit3: View results, playing times and draws online. All in smooth real-time updating

newCompetition.title: Competition overview
newCompetition.name: Name
newCompetition.tooltip: Both start and end dates must be in the future and the end date must be either the same day as the start date or later

categories.title: Categories
categories.noCategories: No categories have been created yet
categories.cannotUpdate: These settings cannot be changed after a draw has been made

categoryGameRules.differentEndgame: Apply different game rules in endgame
categoryGameRules.differentEndgameFrom: Different number of sets in endgame from round
categoryGameRules.useTiebreak: Tiebreak is used in last set

errors.numberOfSetsHasToBeAnOddNumber: The number of sets must be odd.

categorySettings.playersToPlayoff: Number of players to playoffs from each group

create.heading: Create player
create.text: If a player does not have a valid Swedish license (and therefore does not exist in our database), they can be added manually here. They can then be registered for categories in the competition. Note however that they do not have any ranking or seeding.

player.searchRegistered: Search for player registered in the competition
player.title: Player
player.headingHelper: Here you can see players who are registered for the competition. You can also manually add new players. In most cases, however, clubs register their own players online and they will then automatically appear here.
player.name: Name
player.notFound: No player with that name found

add.heading: Register a player in the competition
add.helperText: Here you can add a player manually if he or she has not been registered by their club online previously. If the player is not in the database, it must first be added under
add.search: Search for a player to add

player.walkoverWarningText: Are you sure {player} should give WO in the category? The player will lose all remaining matches in the category

main.title: Draw
main.notDrawnTitle: The category has not been drawn yet.
main.notDrawnNoPlayers: The category has not been drawn yet and there are currently no registered players
main.notDrawnBody: To draw now with the drawing rules that have been set up under category information, click the button below.

subgroupStanding.heading: Subgroups (players with the same group score)
subgroupStanding.introText: In order to rank those who end up on the same group score, a new subgroup is created with only the players who got the same score. Here, the head-to-head ranking is determined via head-to-head, set ratio, ball ratio, or - if nothing else can separate them - lottery.

toasts.scheduleDeletedError: The schedule could not be deleted. Try resetting the categories manually

main.heading: Schedule
main.helperText: If a category has been drawn, you can specify here when it will be played. First fill in the fields above for the number of available tables and match time. When all fields are filled in, you can click 'Schedule'. Then the generated schedule below will be updated so that you can see when the matches in the category are played.
main.needSaving: Changes need to be saved (or removed) before proceeding
main.generatedSchedule: The schedule as it looks now
main.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete the schedule?

generalInfo.heading: Schedule Management
generalInfo.startEnd: The hall's opening hours and number of tables
generalInfo.startEndHelper: If there are too few or too many competition days here, you can change it
generalInfo.cannotChangeTables: The table settings for this day have been changed under 'Advanced'. To update, go to that tab.
generalInfo.availableTablesHeading: Number of tables the tournament is played on
generalInfo.availableTablesHelper: Here the number of available tables for each game day is set as a whole. If it varies by the hour, this can be set
generalInfo.availableTablesNotSet: Not selected, needs to be selected
generalInfo.averageMatchTimeHelper: Set the time each individual match should be allocated in the schedule

advanced.heading: Advanced schedule settings
advanced.pauseHelper: Here you can ensure that matches within a category are not played too close together.
advanced.pauseBetweenGroupAndPlayoff: Pause between group stage and playoff

availableTables.heading: Available tables per day and hour
availableTables.infoText: Here you can set how many tables are available per hour if the number of available tables varies during the day.

results.title: Result
results.search: Search for a player or club

modal.savePartialExplanation: Used to report partial results continuously during a match. These are not validated and no winner is registered.
modal.registerFinishedMatchExplanation: Used when the match is finished and the results are to be saved permanently. Validation is in progress.
modal.info: The settings for how many sets the match contains and how many points are required to win are set for the category as a whole. You can change the settings under

results.noMatches: No draw has been made yet so no matches are set

billing.title: Invoice Management
billing.firstHelperText: The table below shows which categories a club had players in and what the participation cost. This is the basis for the invoice that is generated. Each player in a double category is responsible for half of the registration fees, so if players from different clubs play together each club receives 50% of the cost

toasts.player-error: Could not retrieve cost summary for player

paymentInfo.title: Payment Information
paymentInfo.helperText: Here you can enter the payment information that clubs that have participated in the competition must pay to. This information is printed in the footer of all generated invoices. Note that all fields are optional - if you only use bank giro do not fill in anything for plusgiro or bank account number.
paymentInfo.toastErrorFetch: Failed to fetch current payment information

validations.required: The field must be filled in
validations.noCategories: No categories to add the player to have been selected

player.couldNotBeAddedToCompetition: The player you tried to add was not found. The player is not in the database, it needs to be added first
player.doubleRegistrationError: Either player 1 or player 2 does not appear to be filled in correctly. Please check the details or try again later.

toasts.competitionAdded: The competition has been created. You can now proceed to the next step.
toasts.customCategoryIncomplete: Both name and type need to be selected
toasts.scheduleCollision: Some of the times booked were busy. The matches have still been booked on the desired tables but postponed.

general.update: The data could not be saved. Please double check the entered data or try again later

error.WO: Could not leave WO for player

confirm.redraw: Are you sure you want to redraw the category?
confirm.deleteDraw: Are you sure you want to delete the draw for the category?
confirm.deleteCategory: Are you sure you want to delete the category?
confirm.deleteResult: Are you sure you want to delete the result?
confirm.scheduleChange: Changes here will remove all existing scheduling. Are you sure you want to make changes?

errors.CATEGORY_CANNOT_DELETE_WITH_PLAYERS: Cannot delete a category that has registered players
errors.CATEGORY_CANNOT_UPDATE_AFTER_DRAW: The category cannot be updated after the draw is done. Please remove the draw first if you want to make changes
errors.DRAW_NOT_ENOUGH_REGISTRATIONS: There are not enough registered players to make a draw
errors.DRAW_TOO_FEW_SEEDED: Too few seeded given the number of registrants in the competition
errors.DRAW_TOO_MANY_SEEDED: Too many seeded numbers given the number of registrants in the competition
errors.PLAYER_ALREADY_REGISTERED: The player is already registered in the category
errors.REGISTRATION_WRONG_CATEGORY_TYPE: Wrong category type. Please check if it should be a single or double category
errors.GAME_TOO_FEW_SETS_REPORTED: Too few sets reported. Please double check the category settings to see what rules are set
errors.GAME_TOO_FEW_POINTS_IN_SET: In at least one of the sets, both players appear to have lower scores than required to win. Please double check the category settings to see what rules are set
errors.GAME_COULD_NOT_DECIDE_WINNER: Could not decide who won the game. Double check the entered result or try again later
errors.GAME_TOO_MANY_SETS_REPORTED: Too many sets appear to have been reported. Double check the entered result or try again later
errors.GAME_NOT_ENOUGH_WIN_MARGIN: In at least one of the sets, there is no winner because the winning margin is too small. Double check the entered result and try again
errors.GAME_TOO_MANY_POINTS_IN_SET: In at least one of the sets, the winning margin appears to be too large. Double check the entered result and try again
errors.SCHEDULE_TOO_FEW_TIMESLOTS: Too many matches per time slot. You probably need to increase the number
